title: Prompt Chaining with Lambda Durable Functions
description: Sequential LLM calls where each step builds on the previous one using AWS Lambda durable functions

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates prompt chaining with AWS Lambda durable functions. Each LLM call is checkpointed, enabling automatic retry on failure and deterministic replay.
The example generates a joke about a topic, then uses a second LLM call to review and rate the joke.
Benefits: Expensive retries are avoided by resuming from the last checkpoint. Non-deterministic LLM outputs become deterministic through replay. Failed workflows don't restart from scratch.
